stores.name: Target (UNC Franklin St)
stores.address: 143 W Franklin St Ste 120, Chapel Hill, NC 27516
stores.why: Closest Target to campus for toiletries, snacks, chargers, and quick supplies.

stores.name: Walmart Supercenter (Chapel Hill)
stores.why: Best for cheap bulk supplies, emergency runs, and anything random.

stores.name: Harris Teeter (Carr Mill)
